PerspectiveTransformSupport
public class PerspectiveViewTransformSupport<V,E>
extends AbstractPerspectiveTransformSupport<V,E>
implements PerspectiveTransformSupport

Creates a PerspectiveShapeTransformer to use in the view transform. This one will distort Vertex shapes.

Author:
Tom Nelson
